title: 7 Simple Strategies for Outstanding Leadership
description: Think you know leadership? Think Again.This book puts you in the driverâ€™s seat with a clear roadmap to finally understanding what it takes to become an outstanding leader. In this book, the author mixes a series of easy to read stories with commentary, helping you to quickly relate concepts that you can apply in everyday life.Each page features insights for enhancing skills, building strong relationships and taking your leadership to the next level. This book is a first, tapping into the root of leadership, helping readers implement immediate positive change. Simply stated, this book is a must-have for anyone looking to unleash their true leadership potential.
author: Eric Walker
